name: Night Watch Indie Game
description:
Solve fun puzzles with a friend as Berny and Zip as you search a house for an intruder! Do you think you have what it takes to be on the Night Watch? Night Watch Indie Game is a co-op, mystery, puzzle game (ages 11 and up) made by Interdisciplinary Film & Digital Media students at the University of New Mexico.

Night Watch Indie Game Facebook

University of New Mexico's Film Program
